translation.ja: 夕食を共にしてお互いの過去を語り合った 面白いことに ２人とも仕事を始めた年齢が同じなの

translation.en: and we both started working the very same time.
translation.ja: 面白いことに ２人とも仕事を始めた年齢が同じなの

translation.en: He was 12 and I was 12. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 彼も私も12歳の時だった

translation.en: I had a paper route,
translation.ja: 私は新聞配達を

translation.en: and he was the kid that got the older kids to buy alcohol,
translation.ja: 彼は年上の子に酒を買わせてそれを買い取り

translation.en: sell to him, he'd sell it then for a profit to kids.
translation.ja: また売って利益を仲間に配っていたそうよ

translation.en: So I said, "Okay, I had a paper route, you're a minor selling booze to minors. Great."
translation.ja: “未成年にお酒を売っていたのね”と言ったら

translation.en: He goes, "Yeah, I was very industrious." [chuckles]
translation.ja: “仕事熱心だろ”って

translation.en: So we laughed about that. And he was charismatic.
translation.ja: 笑ったわ カリスマ性があり面白くて聡明な人だった

translation.en: He was… interesting. He was smart.
translation.ja: カリスマ性があり面白くて聡明な人だった

translation.en: It was quick. It was like, "Nice to meet you. Great. Good night.
translation.ja: その夜 別れてすぐに連絡が来たの

translation.en: I really like you. When I find time, let's go out again." [laughs]
translation.ja: 〝君が好きだまた会いたい 〞と 〝君が好きだまた会いたい 〞と〝私も同じ気持ち 〞 〝私も同じ気持ち 〞

translation.en: -[man] Was he pretty serious? -Oh, super serious.
translation.ja: 彼は真剣だった？ すごくね

translation.en: One time I sent him an emoji, the Bitmoji, I said, "Hi."
translation.ja: ある時 私のアバタースタンプを送ったら

translation.en: And he came back with, "You're crazy. Stay cool in school."
translation.ja: 返事が“ワルだね” “学校ではおとなしく”と

translation.en: Little goofy.
translation.ja: “学校ではおとなしく”と

translation.en: His own family said, you know, I made him laugh.
translation.ja: ご家族いわく家でよく笑ってたと 〝笑わせすぎ 〞

translation.en: [laughs] He needed to laugh more. He was not, uh…
translation.ja: もっと笑わせたかった

translation.en: wanting to stick around long.
translation.ja: でも彼は忙しくて

translation.en: He was just so very busy with college coaching, house to house.
translation.ja: コーチの仕事であちこちの家を回っていた

translation.en: [Golden] Another characteristic of Singer's was that, you know, he worked nonstop.
translation.ja: リックは休むことなく働き続けていました

translation.en: From what his former assistants told me, he wouldn't spend the night at a hotel.
translation.ja: 彼の部下の話では夜もホテルには泊まらず

translation.en: He'd spend it on an airplane.
translation.ja: ほぼ機中泊だったと

translation.en: And he would be, you know, texting his assistants at all hours of the day,
translation.ja: １日に何度も仕事のメールを送ってきたり

translation.en: giving them various tasks. He was an extremely driven guy.
translation.ja: 意欲にあふれる熱い男だったようです

translation.en: [Logan] I got the sense he had clients all over the place. I look back on text messages, and every time we connect, he says,
translation.ja: あちこちに顧客がいたようでメールでもよく言ってた

translation.en: "I'm in Dallas. I'm in Fort Lauderdale. I'm in New York. Back to California."
translation.ja: ダラスにいるとかニューヨークにいるとか

translation.en: He even lived out of a van at times when he was coaching.
translation.ja: 車で暮らしてたこともある

translation.en: He had this big Mercedes-type van thing. He'd sleep in it 'cause it was just easier.
translation.ja: メルセデス社製のバンに寝泊まりしてた

translation.en: [Logan] Rick had a passion for just getting up every morning, 4:00 a.m.,
translation.ja: 彼は毎朝４時に起きてトレーニングするの

translation.en: working out, swimming, cycling, running.
translation.ja: 水泳にサイクリングランニング

translation.en: That man was like the Energizer Bunny.
translation.ja: あれほどタフな人には会ったことがない

translation.en: I've never seen anybody that would just have so much energy
translation.ja: あれほどタフな人には会ったことがない 常に動いてる感じで

translation.en: and go, go, go.
translation.ja: 常に動いてる感じで

translation.en: I think he lived on about three hours of sleep a night, from my understanding.
translation.ja: 私の知る限り睡眠時間は３時間程度ね

translation.en: And that was fine with him.
translation.ja: でも平気なの

translation.en: I looked at a lot of his behaviors and realized, you know, he was hiding a lot.
translation.ja: ずっと彼を見てきたけどとにかく謎の多い人だった

translation.en: He had been leading and living this secret life.
translation.ja: 秘密だらけの人生を歩んできたから

translation.en: No wonder why he couldn't get close to people.
translation.ja: 誰とも深く付き合えなかった

translation.en: -[Huneeus] Hey, Rick? -[Singer] Hey there.
translation.ja: リック やあ

translation.en: -Is this a good time? -Yeah. It's good for me.
translation.ja: 今 いいか？ 大丈夫だ

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: My name is Agustin Huneeus.
translation.ja: アグスティン･フニアスです

translation.en: We're sitting in one of the pavilions,
translation.ja: 今 私はナパにある美しいワイナリーにいます

translation.en: enjoying a beautiful afternoon at Quintessa in Napa.
translation.ja: 今 私はナパにある美しいワイナリーにいます 今 私はナパにある美しいワイナリーにいます 〝クインテッサ 〞

translation.en: And so let's go and taste.
translation.ja: 〝クインテッサ 〞 〝クインテッサ 〞 早速 テイスティングを 早速 テイスティングを

translation.en: Just walk me through the whole kind of water polo thing again and how it works.
translation.ja: 水球の件だがもう一度 説明してほしい

translation.en: You and I talked about the economics, timing and how all that works.
translation.ja: 時期や金額今後の流れについて―

translation.en: You and I had a brief conversation about it, but I want to get it straight.
translation.ja: ちゃんと理解しておきたいんだ

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: いいとも

translation.en: I'm putting together your daughter's sports profile now.
translation.ja: ちょうど― 娘さんの経歴をまとめてるところだ

translation.en: It'll be a water polo profile now.
translation.ja: 娘さんの経歴をまとめてるところだ

translation.en: I take her transcript, test scores and profile to the liaison for all sports at USC.
translation.ja: 成績証明書とテストの点数に水球の経験を加え

translation.en: Football… Everybody has to go through her.
translation.ja: ＵＳＣの担当者に提出する

translation.en: [Heinel] My name's Donna Heinel, and I am a senior associate athletic director. I have the…
translation.ja: 体育局のシニアアソシエイトドナ･ヘイネルです

translation.en: [Witz] By all accounts, Donna Heinel was a very diligent supervisor
translation.ja: ヘイネルは真面目で抜け目ない人物だったようで

translation.en: who was really a stickler for details.
translation.ja: ヘイネルは真面目で抜け目ない人物だったようで シンガーは彼女に月２万ドル支払っていました

translation.en: She was also getting 20 grand a month from Singer.
translation.ja: シンガーは彼女に月２万ドル支払っていました

translation.en: And then she… They have meetings every other Thursday, which are called subcommittee meetings,
translation.ja: 彼女は隔週木曜日に学部長らと分科会を開き

translation.en: where the dean of admissions and two admissions staff go through the athletes.
translation.ja: 推薦された生徒について競技ごとに検討する

translation.en: It could be water polo this week, football next week. It could be basketball.
translation.ja: 今週は水球翌週はサッカーという具合に

translation.en: It depends on where they are in the seasons and what's going on.
translation.ja: シーズンも考慮しながら決めていく

translation.en: Heinel became the gatekeeper
translation.ja: 彼女は入試課と体育局の間に立つ―

translation.en: between the admissions department and the athletic department.
translation.ja: 彼女は入試課と体育局の間に立つ― 調整役を担っていました

translation.en: Because the idea was for the students to be treated as recruited athletes,
translation.ja: 優秀な運動選手は スカウトという形で入学を許されます

translation.en: that's virtually a guarantee of admission.
translation.ja: スカウトという形で入学を許されます 事実上の入学保証です

translation.en: Some of the fake athletes at USC, it seems like it would be hard to miss.
translation.ja: ＵＳＣには明らかな偽アスリートがいます

translation.en: I mean, there was a 5'5" men's basketball player.
translation.ja: 165センチのバスケ選手や

translation.en: A high school cheerleader was made to look like a lacrosse player.
translation.ja: ラクロス選手に見せかけたチアリーダー

translation.en: There was a water polo player who didn't play water polo in high school.
translation.ja: 経験ゼロの水球選手などです

translation.en: It's pretty remarkable that none of these things raised a red flag.
translation.ja: これらの選手に疑問を呈する者はなく

translation.en: And on the rare occasion when they did,
translation.ja: もし いたとしても

translation.en: Heinel was there to smooth them over with the admissions department.
translation.ja: ヘイネルと入試課がもみ消します

translation.en: [Singer] Your daughter will get presented, and if the committee says,"She's in,"
translation.ja: 娘さんがその会議で入学を承認されれば

translation.en: then what happens is Donna tells me she's in, we're good.
translation.ja: ドナが私に知らせてくれる

translation.en: Essentially, she's been admitted before she even applied.
translation.ja: 出願前に入学が決まるわけだ

translation.en: At that point, you will send your $200,000 check to our foundation.
translation.ja: その時点で20万ドルを私の財団に送ってくれ

translation.en: Then Jovan will call me and say, "Okay, this is how I want the money split."
translation.ja: その時点で20万ドルを私の財団に送ってくれ ヨヴァンと電話で取り分を決める ヨヴァンと電話で取り分を決める 〝ヨヴァンとは？ 〞 〝ヨヴァンとは？ 〞

translation.en: You understand my daughter's not worthy to be on that team.
translation.ja: 〝ヨヴァンとは？ 〞 娘は― 選手として役に立たない

translation.en: No, no, he's my guy,
translation.ja: ヨヴァンは仲間だ

translation.en: and he knows she's not coming to play. He knows all that.
translation.ja: そんなことは百も承知さ

translation.en: There were four USC employees that were involved with Rick Singer.
translation.ja: ヨヴァン･ヴァヴィック米代表監督事件に関わったのはＵＳＣの職員４名 事件に関わったのはＵＳＣの職員４名

translation.en: One of them was Jovan Vavic, the water polo coach.
translation.ja: そのうちの１人ヨヴァンは水球の監督で

translation.en: Vavic is by far the most successful coach in college water polo.
translation.ja: そのうちの１人ヨヴァンは水球の監督で 大学水球界では有名な人物でした

translation.en: Vavic has been charged by authorities of accepting more than $250,000
translation.ja: 彼は生徒２名を選手として入学させる手伝いをし

translation.en: in exchange for helping two students get into USC as water polo players.
translation.ja: 見返りに25万ドル以上を収受した罪で起訴されました

translation.en: [Singer] Donna Heinel essentially puts them on the recruited walk-on list, which happens all the time.
translation.ja: 奨学生ではなく一般生として入部させるから

translation.en: And they just don't show up for practice, and that's fine.
translation.ja: 練習に出なくても問題ない

translation.en: One of the things Singer took advantage of
translation.ja: リックの手口が通用したのは

translation.en: was the fact that athletic departments and admissions offices
translation.ja: 大学側が選手の技量を精査せず

translation.en: both take a coach's word for the athletic caliber of the person they're recruiting.
translation.ja: コーチの言うことをうのみにしていたからです

translation.en: Is there any risk that this thing blows up in my face?
translation.ja: 本当に大丈夫なんだろうな

translation.en: [Singer] It hasn't in 24 years.
translation.ja: 24年間 失敗はない

translation.en: No, I know all that, but the environment…
translation.ja: だが絶対とは言えないだろ

translation.en: Like, some article comes out
translation.ja: こんな記事が出たら？

translation.en: that the polo team is selling seats into the school for 250 grand.
translation.ja: “ポロチーム 25万ドルで推薦枠を売る”

translation.en: Well, no, because she's a water polo player.
translation.ja: 水球選手だから大丈夫さ

translation.en: But she's not.
translation.ja: 選手じゃない

translation.en: [Chloe] I'm so scared.
translation.ja: 本当に怖い

translation.en: [woman] Check it. No matter what happens, you're gonna be fine.
translation.ja: 見てみなさいきっと大丈夫よ

translation.en: -[man] You have to face it. -[woman] You have to face it. Yeah.
translation.ja: 覚悟を決めて そうよ現実と向き合わなきゃ

translation.en: -You're gonna be fine. I promise. -I got deferred.
translation.ja: そうよ現実と向き合わなきゃ 保留だって

translation.en: [woman] You got deferred?
translation.ja: 保留？

translation.en: There's an update in your application portal, you click on it, and then that letter pops up.
translation.ja: 合否サイトにアクセスしてクリックしたら

translation.en: "We appreciate your passion for our school. We're sorry to inform you…"
translation.ja: “本校への熱意に感謝します残念ながら…”と

translation.en: "…we are unable to offer you admission to Stanford."
translation.ja: “スタンフォード不合格”

translation.en: I'm not getting into San Diego or UCLA.
translation.ja: ＵＣＬＡもサンディエゴ州立大も不合格

translation.en: Just makes me feel like shit.
translation.ja: 最悪の気分よ

translation.en: I literally started bawling. Like, it just angered me.
translation.ja: わめき散らしたわ腹が立った

translation.en: There were a lot of tears, punching the wall, cursing.
translation.ja: 泣いて壁を殴って汚い言葉を吐いた

translation.en: I didn't leave my room. I was crying the entire weekend.
translation.ja: 週末はずっと部屋で泣いてた

translation.en: I got rejected.
translation.ja: ダメだった２０２０年３月27日

translation.en: [Priscilla Sands] I have seen a change, and I have seen a progression.
translation.ja: 大学入試は変化しています

translation.en: And I do think that students are more obsessed with college.
translation.ja: 生徒の大学への執着が強まっているんです 生徒の大学への執着が強まっているんですプリシラ･サンズ 生徒の大学への執着が強まっているんです 生徒の大学への執着が強まっているんですマールボロ･スクール校長

translation.en: I'd say most kids are getting plagued by this anxiety, and you can feel it.
translation.ja: 多くの生徒が大きな不安を抱えています

translation.en: They're freaking out when you meet with them.
translation.ja: 誰もが入試におびえていて

translation.en: They're like, "What if this happens?" "What about that?"
translation.ja: 誰もが入試におびえていて “落ちたらどうしよう”“この論文で大丈夫かな”と

translation.en: "Will they not like me because I wrote this one word?"
translation.ja: “落ちたらどうしよう”“この論文で大丈夫かな”と

translation.en: It's like they're losing their minds because of it.
translation.ja: 冷静さを失っています

translation.en: Basically, I got rejected by almost all of the colleges I applied to.
translation.ja: 受けた大学のほとんどが不合格で

translation.en: It's awful because you think something's wrong with yourself.
translation.ja: 自分に問題があるのかと不安になった

translation.en: When we have children and they apply to colleges, where will they go? No one's getting into colleges at that point.
translation.ja: 私たちの子が受験する頃には入れる大学がないかも

translation.en: It's crazy. Like, USC's acceptance rate just went down three more percent.
translation.ja: ＵＳＣの合格率はまた３％下がって

translation.en: It's at 12% now, which is like…
translation.ja: たった12％よ

translation.en: Most students who wanna go to college could find a college.
translation.ja: 望めば入れる大学はあります

translation.en: The problem is
translation.ja: 問題なのは―

translation.en: far too many students want to go to the same colleges.
translation.ja: 多くの生徒が同じ大学を志望すること

translation.en: My goals were Ivy League. I wanted to get in that.
translation.ja: アイビーリーグしか眼中になかった

translation.en: And when I didn't get in, I was… just broken.
translation.ja: 入れなくて絶望したよ

translation.en: I took AP bio. I'm taking AP environmental science this year. I…
translation.ja: 生物学と環境科学のＡＰクラスを受けた

translation.en: I'm not interested in it at all.
translation.ja: 興味もないのに

translation.en: Just to have this extra leverage that doesn't even help.
translation.ja: 入試に有利だと思ったけどムダだった

translation.en: [Barbara Kalmus] This is going on in high schools across the country.
translation.ja: いくつＡＰクラスを取るかが重要なんです

translation.en: How many advanced classes can you take?
translation.ja: いくつＡＰクラスを取るかが重要なんです 音楽の単位を捨てても科学のＡＰを履修する

translation.en: You drop orchestra because if you don't do orchestra, you can take another science class.
translation.ja: 音楽の単位を捨てても科学のＡＰを履修するバーバラ･カルムス教育コンサルタント

translation.en: There's so much pressure on these kids. Because if a school offers 15 APs and you've only taken one,
translation.ja: ＡＰが15講座ある高校で１つしか選択しなかったら

translation.en: you can cross off the top 50 schools in the country.
translation.ja: 上位50校は狙えません

translation.en: You have people who just go home and all they do is homework.
translation.ja: 家に帰ったらひたすら課題をこなすだけ

translation.en: I hate seeing how it consumes people's lives.
translation.ja: 人生をムダにしてると思う

translation.en: I think social media is a contributing factor,
translation.ja: ＳＮＳの影響も大きいと思います

translation.en: because as soon as a student anywhere has an acceptance,
translation.ja: ＳＮＳの影響も大きいと思います 合格した生徒は― すぐにネットで結果を報告しますよね

translation.en: it goes onto social media,
translation.ja: すぐにネットで結果を報告しますよね

translation.en: so it's just another time to sort of feel a punch in the gut.
translation.ja: 落ちた生徒にはつらい仕打ちです

translation.en: It's just really shitty to feel like this.
translation.ja: すごく悔しいけど…

translation.en: And I know that people that got in are super deserving.
translation.ja: 受かった子は超優秀なんでしょうね

translation.en: I like to curl my fake lash with my real lashes.
translation.ja: つけまつげと自まつげを一緒にカールするの

translation.en: [Fry] Olivia Jade is an extremely successful YouTube influencer.
translation.ja: オリヴィア･ジェイドは人気ユーチューバーで

translation.en: She had millions of followers watch these videos where she would,
translation.ja: チャンネル登録者は数百万に上ります チャンネル登録者は数百万に上りますナオミ･フライ チャンネル登録者は数百万に上ります チャンネル登録者は数百万に上ります「ニューヨーカー」ライター

translation.en: you know, get up, brush her teeth, do her morning makeup routine,
translation.ja: 起床から歯磨き メイクなどルーティン動画を中心に

translation.en: pick out outfits.
translation.ja: 起床から歯磨き メイクなどルーティン動画を中心に 日常系の動画をアップしていました

translation.en: So it's this very diary-like thing,
translation.ja: 日常系の動画をアップしていました

translation.en: but with the added benefit of branding opportunities.
translation.ja: 自身のブランドも立ち上げています

translation.en: I created my own collection with Princess Polly.
translation.ja: プリンセス･ポリーとコラボしたの

translation.en: I get to reveal and announce
translation.ja: 紹介するね

translation.en: my highlight palette with Sephora Collection.
translation.ja: セフォラとコラボしたメイクパレットよ

translation.en: [Fry] She's the child of the actress Lori Loughlin
translation.ja: 彼女の母親はロリ･ロックリンで

translation.en: and the fashion designer Mossimo Giannulli.
translation.ja: 父親はデザイナーのモッシモ･ジャヌリです

translation.en: They supposedly had both of their daughters, Olivia Jade and Bella,
translation.ja: ２人はオリヴィアともう１人の娘ベラを

translation.en: pose on a rowing machine, and sent these pictures to Rick Singer
translation.ja: ボートの練習用マシンに乗せて撮影し

translation.en: and had them accepted into USC as coxswains.
translation.ja: ボート選手としてＵＳＣに入学させました

translation.en: I went to high school with Olivia Jade. I know the school she was at.
translation.ja: オリヴィアと同じ高校に通っていたの

translation.en: I saw a picture of Olivia Jade's sister on the wall with the seniors,
translation.ja: 校内に彼女のお姉さんの写真が貼ってあり “ＵＳＣ合格おめでとう”と書かれてた

translation.en: and it was like, "Congratulations for getting into USC."
translation.ja: “ＵＳＣ合格おめでとう”と書かれてた

translation.en: And then I remember hearing later that Olivia had also gotten into USC.
translation.ja: その後 オリヴィアも合格したと聞いて驚いた

translation.en: I was like, "Whoa." 'Cause USC is extremely hard to get into.
translation.ja: あんな難関校に姉妹そろって―

translation.en: So not only one sister, but both of them.
translation.ja: 合格するなんてね

translation.en: Off to school.
translation.ja: これから学校よ

translation.en: [Loughlin] Bye, Olivia. Have a lovely day.
translation.ja: 楽しんできてね

translation.en: -I know you're so excited. -I won't. I will not.
translation.ja: 無理よ　楽しいわけない

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.ja: 知らない

translation.en: [Naomi Fry] There's an Olivia Jade video where it's the first day of her senior year of high school,
translation.ja: オリヴィアが高校最終学年に進級した日の動画があります

translation.en: and she's pretty miserable.
translation.ja: ひどい内容です

translation.en: I've gone to one class, and I wanna die.

translation.ja: 友達が電話をくれたの

translation.en: "Hey, who's the guy you worked for at the getting-into-college company?"
translation.ja: “君が勤めてる入試関連会社だけど…” “社長の名前は？”

translation.en: I said, "Rick Singer. Why?" He says, "You gotta be kidding." I said, "No, why?"
translation.ja: リック･シンガーだと答えたら 驚いた様子で

translation.en: "Turn on the news. Go on Facebook. Go on Instagram. Whatever."
translation.ja: “ニュースを見ろFacebookでもいい”

translation.en: [chuckling] "Just open up your phone and look."
translation.ja: “とにかく携帯で調べてみろ”と

translation.en: And I couldn't believe it.
translation.ja: 信じられなかった

translation.en: There's a videotape of Rick just walking solemnly
translation.ja: リックが取材陣に囲まれ神妙な顔で歩いてた

translation.en: with all these reporters, and not looking at anyone,
translation.ja: リックが取材陣に囲まれ神妙な顔で歩いてた うつむく姿を見て胸が痛んだわ

translation.en: and my…
translation.ja: うつむく姿を見て胸が痛んだわ

translation.en: My heart just sank. It just sank.
translation.ja: うつむく姿を見て胸が痛んだわ つらかった

translation.en: [Vandemoer] Finally, it was time for me to go in.
translation.ja: 運命の時が来ました

translation.en: It's my time to be sentenced.
translation.ja: 判決が出たんです

translation.en: Rick was still in there. We literally have to cross each other right away.
translation.ja: リックが出てきて私たちとすれ違いました

translation.en: Rick, of course, doesn't look me in the eye or anything else.
translation.ja: 当然ながらリックは目も合わせません

translation.en: It just, uh… I'll never forget that moment when we walked by each other like that.
translation.ja: あの瞬間のことを私は決して忘れないでしょう

translation.en: My heart was pounding.
translation.ja: 緊張しました

translation.en: Um, sitting between my two lawyers and the judge comes up
translation.ja: 待っていると判事が現れ

translation.en: and "conspiracy racketeering" is what I end up pleading guilty to.
translation.ja: 認めるべき罪状を告げられました

translation.en: [Fisher] Judge Zobel understood that this was a guy
translation.ja: 判事には分かっていました

translation.en: who really cared deeply about his students and there was no need to send him to jail.
translation.ja: 学生思いの彼に懲役など不要であると

translation.en: [Zobel] Mr. Vandemoer is probably the least culpable of all of the defendants in this group of cases.
translation.ja: ジョンは一連の事件で最も罪の軽い人物でしょう

translation.en: Certainly the parents are in a different position.
translation.ja: 生徒の親とは立場が違いますし

translation.en: The other coaches benefitted for themselves.
translation.ja: 他のコーチは金を懐に入れましたが

translation.en: He did not do that.
translation.ja: 彼は違いました

translation.en: [Vandemoer] She gave me six months of home confinement, two years of probation.
translation.ja: 判決は半年の自宅軟禁と２年間の保護観察

translation.en: And I got a $10,000 fine.
translation.ja: 罰金１万ドルでした

translation.en: I think, for John, that was truly the right decision.
translation.ja: ジョンにとって正当な判決です

translation.en: And he didn't have to serve time.
translation.ja: 刑務所行きを免れ

translation.en: He's home with his kids. He's bettering himself. He's going back to school. He has a job.
translation.ja: 子供と自宅で過ごし新しい仕事も見つけました

translation.en: He seems, when I talk to him, that he's in a much, much better place.
translation.ja: とてもいい環境で暮らしているようです

translation.en: I believe, in Stanford's victim impact letter,
translation.ja: 一方 事件の被害者であるスタンフォードは

translation.en: they said they're still in possession of over $700,000 in donations.
translation.ja: 一方 事件の被害者であるスタンフォードは 70万ドル以上の寄付金を返していません

translation.en: Neither me or any associates working for me at the firm
translation.ja: 私を含め弁護士は皆驚いています

translation.en: could find any case where the victim of a racketeering conspiracy,
translation.ja: 私を含め弁護士は皆驚いています 詐欺や不正の被害者が

translation.en: at the end of the conspiracy ended up $770,000 richer than they were at the beginning of the conspiracy.
translation.ja: 最終的に77万ドルの利益を得るなど前代未聞です

translation.en: [Amott] Rick Singer is back in Sacramento.
translation.ja: サクラメントに戻ってきた―

translation.en: He drives around town. He's still in his athletic clothes.
translation.ja: サクラメントに戻ってきた― スポーツウェア姿の彼をよく見かけました

translation.en: He doesn't look any flashier.
translation.ja: スポーツウェア姿の彼をよく見かけました

translation.en: He swims twice a day at a local tennis club.
translation.ja: 地元のテニスクラブで１日２回 泳ぎ

translation.en: And he gets out of the pool in a Speedo,
translation.ja: 地元のテニスクラブで１日２回 泳ぎ 水着のまま ヨガや腕立て伏せをしながら

translation.en: does yoga, push-ups, and he's on the phone.
translation.ja: 水着のまま ヨガや腕立て伏せをしながら

translation.en: Sometimes he has multiple phones.
translation.ja: あちこちに電話を

translation.en: My understanding, he's telling people that he's not gonna go to jail because they know the judge, etcetera.
translation.ja: 刑務所に入るつもりはないと言い回っているようでした

translation.en: Again, knowing Rick Singer, you don't know what to believe.
translation.ja: でもリックを知る人は誰も―

translation.en: You don't know if he believes it or if it's an outright lie.
translation.ja: 彼の言うことを信用しないでしょう

translation.en: Um, you know, he's plead guilty to four felonies. I just have to believe he's going to go to jail.
translation.ja: すでに４つの罪を認めており刑務所行きは確実です

translation.en: [man] Is the system broken? Any comment on anything?
translation.ja: あなたの計画は破綻したんですか？

translation.en: [Fry] There's a video in which you see a guy with a mic
translation.ja: 男性がリックにマイクを向け質問していますが

translation.en: trying to get Rick Singer to answer questions, and he just stonewalls them.
translation.ja: 男性がリックにマイクを向け質問していますが リックは一切 答えません

translation.en: Can any good come out of this, Rick?
translation.ja: なぜ無視を？

translation.en: [Fry] He seems unperturbed by these people trying to interview him.
translation.ja: 質問に対して動揺する様子も見られず

translation.en: It makes you wonder about the levels of his regret.
translation.ja: 反省してるのか分かりません

translation.en: He's a bit of a cipher in his attitude about this whole affair.
translation.ja: 事件をどう思っているのか不可解な態度です

translation.en: You seem comfortable. You're taking your time here.
translation.ja: のんびり過ごしてますね

translation.en: Did you really work with over 700 families?
translation.ja: 700組以上の家族の指導を？

translation.en: Rick, is the system broken?
translation.ja: 答えてください

translation.en: [reporter 1] Actress Lori Loughlin of Full House was sentenced to two months in prison.
translation.ja: ロリ･ロックリンには禁錮２ヵ月が科せられ…

translation.en: [reporter 2] Her husband, Mossimo Giannulli, was sentenced to five months.
translation.ja: 夫のモッシモは５ヵ月の禁錮刑に

translation.en: [reporter 3] Actress Felicity Huffman received 14 days behind bars.
translation.ja: フェリシティは禁錮14日間です

translation.en: [Kalmus] No good will have come out of these sentences or out of this scandal.
translation.ja: これらの判決はまったく無意味です

translation.en: The fines they've been given, meaningless.
translation.ja: 罰金も あの程度では話になりません

translation.en: In terms of hitting them in their pocketbook,
translation.ja: 彼らの懐が痛むくらいの高額を科し

translation.en: what a difference it could have made if we hit them hard
translation.ja: 彼らの懐が痛むくらいの高額を科し 恵まれない子のために使うなら話は別です

translation.en: and put that money to work for underprivileged kids.
translation.ja: 恵まれない子のために使うなら話は別です

translation.en: That would have been amazing. Then you can say at least some good came of it.
translation.ja: それなら多少は意味があるといえるでしょう

translation.en: I try not to blame the families or the parents.
translation.ja: 不正をした親のことはあまり責めたくありません

translation.en: I tend to focus the criticism on the colleges
translation.ja: 私が追及したいのは 入試システムを作った大学のほうです

translation.en: and universities that created this system.
translation.ja: 入試システムを作った大学のほうです

translation.en: If they didn't have these loopholes and these preferences for families of privilege,
translation.ja: 特権階級に有利な抜け道だらけの制度のせいで

translation.en: then I don't think there would be these kind of temptations.
translation.ja: 多くの人々が誘惑に負けました

translation.en: This scandal is not necessarily a reason for colleges to change their ways.
translation.ja: この事件を契機に大学が変わるとは限りません

translation.en: Because it makes the colleges seem more exclusive and desirable than ever.
translation.ja: むしろ特別な存在として価値を高めたからです

translation.en: If all these rich people are willing to go to these incredible lengths
translation.ja: 大金持ちが監獄行きの危険を冒してまで

translation.en: and risk jail time just to get their kids into these colleges,
translation.ja: 我が子を入学させようとした

translation.en: then they must be extremely valuable.
translation.ja: それだけの価値があるわけです

translation.en: What are we doing to these kids by pounding them into the ground
translation.ja: なぜ大学ランキングにこだわるのでしょう

translation.en: with "top 25, top 10, top 5"?
translation.ja: トップ10だ トップ５だと

translation.en: Because ultimately, where you do go to school
translation.ja: どの大学に行っても

translation.en: has little or no effect on what will happen to you in the future.
translation.ja: その後の人生にはほとんど影響ないのに

translation.en: The United States has over 3,000 colleges.
translation.ja: アメリカには3000以上の大学がある

translation.en: You have infinite choices.
translation.ja: 選択肢は無限です

translation.en: Forget about USC. Go someplace else.
translation.ja: ＵＳＣがダメなら別の大学に行けばいい

translation.en: You can get a great education almost any place if you want it.
translation.ja: 望めば どこででも最高の教育を受けられる

translation.en: The parents in this case didn't believe that.
translation.ja: 親たちはそれを信じず

translation.en: Because the bigger school had the prestige,
translation.ja: いい大学にこそ名誉と輝きがあると

translation.en: had the glitter, had the glamour, had the bragging rights.
translation.ja: いい大学にこそ名誉と輝きがあると 誤解したのです

translation.en: Why did these parents choose to cheat this
translation.ja: なぜ親は不正をしたのでしょう 子供には十分に能力があるのに

translation.en: when their children had so much already?
translation.ja: 子供には十分に能力があるのに

translation.en: Part of it seems to be when you reach a certain level of wealth, there's a relentless pursuit of the trappings of power.
translation.ja: ある程度以上の財力を持つとブランド志向が強まります

translation.en: You wanna have the fancy car, the fancy house, whether you need it or not,
translation.ja: 必要もないのに高級車や豪邸を買い

translation.en: and it just seems to me
translation.ja: 財力を誇示する

translation.en: that the atmosphere created in high-wealth societies is part of the problem.
translation.ja: 超富裕層にある この考えが問題を引き起こすのです

translation.en: In America, we love the wealthy and we hate the wealthy.
translation.ja: 私たちは金持ちを愛し同時に憎んでもいます

translation.en: They disgust us and they fascinate us.
translation.ja: 腹立たしいけれど魅力もある

translation.en: This story was a perfect opportunity to see how rich people live
translation.ja: 私たちは この事件を通して裕福な人々の生活と

translation.en: and the realities of the system being exposed,
translation.ja: その裏にある現実を見ました

translation.en: and so there's something incredibly refreshing
translation.ja: そして不正だらけの世の中に

translation.en: to have just a little bit of justice being served in a sea of injustice.
translation.ja: そして不正だらけの世の中に わずかな正義を見て爽快さを味わったのです

translation.en: [Fisher] Rick will be living with this for quite a while.
translation.ja: まだ事件は終わっていません

translation.en: If he didn't cooperate, he would have been charged, maybe convicted already.
translation.ja: リックは捜査協力を続け刑務所行きを免れています

translation.en: And right now he's out, a free man still.
translation.ja: つまり自由の身なのです

translation.en: And his cooperation won't be complete until the very last person
translation.ja: 事件の被告人全員に判決が下るまで

translation.en: charged in this conspiracy is sentenced, and that is most likely gonna be a while from now.
translation.ja: 協力を続けるでしょうまだまだ先は長そうです
